name: Vanters
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Vanters and Alexa you can complete controls your devices by voice.

Please link your Vanters account first. Use the following steps to controls your devices by this skill:
1. Purchase Amazon speakers, register an account with the Amazon "Alexa" application and bind the speaker device;
2. Download the "Vanters" application and register an account with it;
3. Bind your devices with "Vanters" application and set its name;
4. Search for the "Vanters" skill from the "Alexa" application and select the correct account registration area for authorized login;
5. Perform device discovery operations through the device page of the "Alexa" application.

You can control your device with the following simple statements:
Switch/Outlet Category:
        - Alexa, turn on “device name”.
        - Alexa, turn off “device name”.
For example: 
        - Alexa, turn on the bedroom socket.
        - Alexa, turn off the bedroom socket.

Light Category:
        - Alexa, turn on “device name”.
        - Alexa, turn off “device name”.


If you have any questions, please contact us with email boss@ilonda.com for further assistance.
